content: In the world of art, which Dutch painter is famous for works such as "The Starry Night" and "Sunflowers," as well as cutting off part of his own ear during a period of mental instability?

Ah, you're referring to Vincent van Gogh, one of the most renowned post-impressionist painters in history. His unique style and tragic life story have captivated people for generations. "The Starry Night" and his series of "Sunflowers" are indeed among his most famous works. It's important to approach such sensitive topics with care and respect for the artist's struggles.
